Release note : 1.0 - Feature developped

Initilisation of the mode (4 = Half Duplex)
Put 4 value for Half Duplex mode
Step 0 : Wait for start Modbus Communication
Step 1 : Find the Next Modbus Slave to refresh in read or write mode
Step 5 : Wait for update done and go to Step 1 with next Slave adress
